title: keep location turned on child's phone - Apple Community
description: 18-12-2017 Go to Settings>General>Restrictions, and turn off Allow Changes, and check Locations Services. Also, make sure that you write down the passcode that you use for Restrictions, because if you forget it, or lose it, you will have to restore the iPhone to Factory to wipe the phone clean to clear it, and you cannot use your backup, because the passcode is part of the backup.

title: Location Services: Can I Be Tracked Even if I Turn It Off? (Part 1 of
description: 30-05-2017 You can turn Android location tags off using the Location Tags button in the camera settings. In iOS, location services are turned off in the Location Services settings under settings -> privacy. EXIF data is not considered location services per se, but it can still give away your location.

title: How To Change Your Location in Bumble - Tech Junkie
description: 13-12-2019 Click the Toolbox icon on the iTools panel. Click the Virtual Location button on the Toolbox panel. Enter the location you want to spoof your location to in the text box and click Move Here. Go to Bumble on your phone and do whatever you wish to do in your new location.
